2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Aid
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Augury
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: By casting gem-inlaid sticks, rolling dragon bones, laying out ornate cards, or employing some other divining tool, you receive an omen from an otherworldly entity.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Blindness/Deafness
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You can blind or deafen a foe.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Calm Emotions
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You attempt to suppress strong emotions in a group of people.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Continual Flame
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Enhance Ability
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Find Traps
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You sense the presence of any trap within range that is within line of sight.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Gentle Repose
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a corpse or other remains.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Hold Person
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Lesser Restoration
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Locate Object
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Prayer of Healing
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Protection from Poison
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You touch a creature. If it is poisoned, you neutralize the poison.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Silence
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: For the duration, no sound can be created within or pass through a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Spiritual Weapon
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Warding Bond
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: This spell wards a willing creature you touch and creates a mystic connection between you and the target.

2ndLevelClericSpells.Name: Zone of Truth
2ndLevelClericSpells.Description: You create a magical zone that guards against deception.
